name: The Red Warrior II - Trial
description:
Trial Version. 

Steer the red warrior through various puzzling challenges, in an unforgiving world full of mysterious and dangerous creatures.

I am trying to share with everyone a unique story that has haunted me. The game is yet to see its final chapter. However i am working hard to give you the best experience i can give.

This is the new version of my old game The Red Warrior, and like the previous one it's a one man team.

It's not the complete version of the game, it's only a pre-release. I'll be working on the complete version later, specially if i got support in this version

If you feel like supporting me to complete the game and make new games thank you for buying the full version of the game.

I hope you enjoy the game and try your best to finish it.
